author: The Telegraph
title: Legend premiere tickets prize draw: terms and conditions
text: Legend London Premiere Prize Draw Terms and Conditions 1. This prize draw is open to residents of the UK, Channel Islands, Isle of Man and Republic of Ireland aged 18 years or over, except employees of Telegraph Media Group Limited and Studiocanal Limited, their families, agents or anyone else professionally associated with the draw. 2. Details of how to enter form part of the terms and conditions. It is a condition of entry that all rules are accepted as final and that the competitor agrees to abide by these rules. The decision of the judges is final and no correspondence will be entered into. 3. Entries must be submitted via telegraph.co.uk/legendpremiere and entry is restricted to one per person. Once submitted, entries cannot be amended in any way. 4. Late, illegible, incomplete, defaced or corrupt entries or entries sent through agencies and third parties will not be accepted. No responsibility can be accepted for lost entries and proof of despatch will not be accepted as proof of receipt. The winner will be drawn at random from all entries received by the closing date. The winner’s name and county can be obtained by sending a sae to Legend Premiere Prize Draw Winner, Telegraph Create, 111 Buckingham Palace Road, London SW1W 0DT within one month after the closing date of the prize draw. 5. All entries must be received by 12:00 on Tuesday September 1, 2015. 6. The Promoter will contact the winner by telephone by 5pm on Tuesday, September 1, 2015. Should the Promoter be unable to contact the winner by this deadline or should the winner be unable to accept the prize, the Promoter reserves the right to award the prize to an alternative winner, drawn in accordance with these terms and conditions. 7. The prize as described is available on the date of publication. Should the prize become unavailable, a substitute of equal or greater value will be provided. 8. One winning entrant will win two tickets to the London premiere of “Legend”, which takes place at Odeon, Leicester Square, London on Thursday, September 3, 2015. The prize includes one night’s 4-star accommodation in The Strand Palace Hotel, London on the night of the premiere. Accommodation is based on two people sharing a twin or double room on a bed and breakfast basis. 9. The Prize must be taken as one package. 10. The prize does not include travel to or from the event, food and drink, personal expenditure or incidental costs, other than where mentioned. 11. The winner must collect their tickets from The Strand Palace Hotel after 4pm on the day. Odeon Leicester Square doors open at 6.00pm and the winner and their guest must be seated by 7.00pm. A smart dress code applies. The winner’s guest must meet the age criteria according to the film’s certification. Where the winner’s guest is under 18 years of age, they must have prior parental or guardian permission. Studiocanal Limited reserves the right to refuse admittance where, at its sole discretion, any of the requirements of this condition are not met. 12. On arrival at the hotel, the winner will be required to present a valid credit card as a security deposit. 13. All elements of the prize are subject to availability, non transferable and there are no cash alternatives. 14. The winner may be required to participate in publicity. 15. Saving where entrants have given permission to be contacted by Studiocanal Limited for marketing purposes, personal information about entrants will only be shared with the Promoter’s competition partners and with the Promoter’s agents to the extent necessary to manage such entry and participation as an entrant or, where required, to a legal or regulatory body. 16. Events may occur that render the prize draw itself or the awarding of the prize impossible due to reasons beyond the control of the Promoter and/or Studiocanal Limited. Accordingly the Promoter and/or Studiocanal Limited may at its absolute discretion vary, amend or cancel the promotion without notice and the entrant agrees that no liability shall attach to the Promoter and/or Studiocanal Limited as a result thereof. Any changes to the promotion will be notified to entrants by the Promoter as soon as possible. 17. The Telegraph is responsible for the first part of the promotion, which is the publication and adjudication of the prize draw. Provision of the prize is the responsibility of Studiocanal Limited. 18. These Terms are to be interpreted in accordance with English law and any dispute arising out of these Terms or their subject matter is subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the English Courts. Promoter: Telegraph Media Group Limited, 111 Buckingham Palace Road, London SW1W 0DT. telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
